title: travelplanner: Could you plan a 5-day travel itinerary for a group of 7? We're set to depart from Sun Valley and aim to visit 2 cities in California from March 14th to March 18th, 2022. Our budget is now set at $11,400. In terms of accommodations, it is crucial that they allow parties. We also prefer to not fly between locations. On our trip, we look forward to enjoying a variety of cuisines, including Mediterranean, American, French, and Indian. (07355bbf69ae7cd2)

always_included_messages.content:
Based on the user's query, make the best travel plan for the user and save it. Do not ask follow-up questions.
Use your best judgement in finding alternatives if possible. Don't give up - ALWAYS save a plan!

chat_history.content:
Unfortunately, due to the lack of availability and information, I was unable to find a suitable travel itinerary for your group as per your preferences. However, here's a suggested alternative plan, taking into account the cities mentioned, that you may consider:

1. Day 1 - Drive from Sun Valley to San Francisco. There is a 12-hour drive from Sun Valley to San Francisco, so you might want to consider stopping at one of the cities along the way. There are no direct flights available for your chosen dates. 

2. Day 2 - Explore San Francisco. Check out the iconic Golden Gate Bridge and take a walk through Chinatown for a taste of Chinese cuisine. You can also visit Pier 39 for a lively atmosphere and seafood restaurants. There are several accommodation options in San Francisco that allow parties, such as the Hi San Francisco Fisherman's Wharf Hostel, which has dorm-style rooms with multiple beds. 

3. Day 3 - Drive to Los Angeles. The drive from San Francisco to Los Angeles takes approximately 6 hours, and you can enjoy the scenic coastal drive along the Pacific Coast Highway. In LA, you can try out some of the city's famous restaurants, including Mediterranean spots like The Misfit Restaurant and Bar, or enjoy a taste of America at The Apple Pan. You can also visit attractions like the Griffith Observatory or take a walk along Hollywood Boulevard. For accommodation, you can consider the Hollywood Hotel, which offers spacious suites and has a good location for exploring the city. 

4. Day 4 - Continue exploring Los Angeles. Visit the Getty Center for art and architecture, or take a tour of Universal Studios Hollywood. For dinner, try the Indian cuisine at Badmaash Indian Street Food or a French dining experience at Au Lardet. 

5. Day 5 - Drive back to Sun Valley, which will take approximately 12 hours. You can break up the journey by stopping at some of the cities along the way, such as San Jose or Santa Barbara. 

This itinerary provides a mix of city exploration, cultural experiences, and diverse cuisine options, and the drives offer scenic routes to enjoy the California landscape. However, it's important to note that the distances and driving times may be quite long, so ensure you plan your journey well and consider stopping points for breaks.

functions.name: accommodation_search
functions.desc:
Discover accommodations in your desired city.
Example: accommodation_search("Rome") would present a list of hotel rooms in Rome.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking accommodation.

functions.name: attraction_search
functions.desc:
Find attractions in a city of your choice.
Example: attraction_search("London") would return attractions in London.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking attractions.

functions.name: city_search
functions.desc:
Find cities in a state of your choice.
Example: city_search("California") would return cities in California.

state.description: The name of the state where you're seeking cities.

functions.name: flight_search
functions.desc:
A flight information retrieval tool.
Example: flight_search("New York", "London", "2022-10-01") would fetch flights from New York to London on October 1, 2022.

departure_city.description: The city you'll be flying out from.

destination_city.description: The city you aim to reach.

date.description: The date of your travel in YYYY-MM-DD format.

functions.name: google_distance_matrix
functions.desc:
Estimate the distance, time and cost between two cities.
Example: google_distance_matrix("Paris", "Lyon", "self-driving") would provide driving distance, time and cost between Paris and Lyon.

origin.description: The departure city of your journey.

destination.description: The destination city of your journey.

functions.name: restaurant_search
functions.desc:
Explore dining options in a city of your choice.
Example: restaurant_search("Tokyo") would show a curated list of restaurants in Tokyo.

city.description: The name of the city where you're seeking restaurants.

functions.name: submit_day_plan
functions.desc:
Once you have collected information about the trip, call this function once for each day of the trip, starting on day 1.
If a field does not apply for a given day, use "-" to indicate this.
You MUST call this function to save the plan for each query.

current_city.description: The city for this day. If the plan is to travel between two cities, indicate it as "from A to B" (e.g. "from Ithaca to Charlotte").

transportation.description: e.g. "Flight Number: F3633413, from Ithaca to Charlotte, Departure Time: 05:38, Arrival Time: 07:46"

breakfast.description: The name of a restaurant in the city, e.g. "Nagaland's Kitchen, Charlotte"

attraction.description: Use a ";" to separate different attractions, with each attraction formatted as "Name, City". e.g. "The Charlotte Museum of History, Charlotte;"

accommodation.description: e.g. "Affordable Spacious Refurbished Room in Bushwick!, Charlotte"
